#summary Create the WSExplorer Jar

= Create the WSExplorer Jar =

  # Open the project in Eclipse
  # Right-click the project and choose Export
  # Create a name for the Jar file
  # Choose to use the current jar description (wsexplorer.jardesc) in the project (should be at the top level)
  # Choose to use the current manifest(wsexplorer.mf) in the project (should be at the top level)
  # Finish the Wizard
  # Be sure and put all the Jars listed in the wsexplorer.mf at the same level as the WSExplorer.jar.
